title: What's better for building?
body: building  a bunch of compents for multiple items, or focusing and building 1 item at a time?

replies.body: depends heavily on how item-reliant you are and how heavily you powerspike at certain items.

Also depend on who you are fighting and how. If I am playing kled into nasus I will rush bramble vest then go black cleaver to reduce his heals then eat his armor. If its VS a garen, he has no heals in combat so Ill rush a B/C.
